Quick iOS - QML Theme and Component Library for iOS
===================================================

Prerequisites
-------------

 * Qt iOS SDK >= 5.3
 * XCode >= 6.0
 * [ios-deploy](https://github.com/phonegap/ios-deploy)

Build Instruction for Command Line
----------------------------------

 1. mkdir build
 1. cd build
 1. ../generate_ios.sh
 1. ../build_ios.sh
 1. If build success, it will run app with lldb debugger
